rules.name: Use Chakra UI 3.0 Dialog components
rules.description: Always use Chakra UI 3.0 Dialog components from @/components/ui/dialog instead of legacy modals
rules.message: Use Chakra UI 3.0 Dialog components from @/components/ui/dialog instead of legacy Modal components
rules.replacement: import { DialogRoot, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogBody, DialogFooter, DialogCloseTrigger } from "@/components/ui/dialog"

rules.name: Use useDisclosure with Dialog
rules.description: Do not use useDisclosure directly with Modal, use it with Dialog components
rules.message: Use the Dialog open/onOpenChange pattern instead of useDisclosure with Modal components

rules.name: Prefer Dialog pattern over legacy Modal
rules.description: Use Dialog components with the open/onOpenChange pattern

rules.name: Avoid using Divider component
rules.description: Divider component is removed in Chakra UI 3.0. Use <Box as="hr"> instead
rules.message: Divider component doesn't exist in Chakra UI 3.0. Use <Box as="hr" borderColor="gray.700" opacity={0.2} my={3} /> instead

rules.name: Use Skeleton instead of Spinner
rules.description: Always use Skeleton components for loading states instead of Spinners for better UX
rules.message: Prefer using Skeleton components instead of Spinners for loading states. Import from @/components/ui/skeleton

rules.name: Avoid using Card component
rules.description: Card component is removed in Chakra UI 3.0. Use Box with styling instead
rules.message: Card component doesn't exist in Chakra UI 3.0. Use <Box borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="md" p={4} bg="cardBg"> instead

rules.name: Avoid using Select component
rules.description: Select component is changed in Chakra UI 3.0. Use native select or a custom component
rules.message: Use native <select> element or implement a custom Select using Chakra UI 3.0 components
